Bury St Edmunds Mobile Library Route 18

Contact us:

Managers: Carl Bell and Kevin Lambert

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 351249

Route timetable

Stop Village Location Time
18A Denston Top of the Green 1030-1050
18B Stradishall Chestnut Court 1100-1120
18C Sowley Green 150 Bury Road 1130-1140
18D Great Thurlow 109 Bury Road 1145-1200
18E Great Bradley Evergreen Estate 1210-1235
18F Great & Little Thurlow Thurlow Sports Club 1245-1305
18G Great Wratting Coronation Cottages 1400-1420
18H Barnardiston Church 1430-1440
18I Hundon Village Hall 1450-1550
18J Stradishall St Margaret’s Place 1600-1615

Calling every 4 weeks on Wednesdays:

2019: 2 January, 30 January, 27 February, 27 March, 24 April, 22 May, 19 June, 17 July, 14 August, 11 September, 9 October, 6 November, 4 December
